participant_1.background:
I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend.
I am a person who is happy with my hobbies and I am not too concerned about what others think of me.
I'm a bit of a klutz but I'm comfortable with who I am and I'll do everything I can to give my child a good future.
I want to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends.
I'm going to see my brother this weekend to take my mind off my wife.

My first purchase was a baseball glove for my son.
i like to write poetry in my spare time.
I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.
i work graveyard in a hotel.
i recently lost both my parents to an automobile accident.

content.text: I'm doing great! I just moved to Salt Lake City with my girlfriend.
That's awesome! What brought you to Salt Lake City?
I wanted to be closer to my girlfriend. We've been dating for a few years now and I think it's time to take the next step in our relationship.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that things are going well for you.
Thanks! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to write poetry in my spare time. I also like to play video games and go for walks with my dog, Percy.
That's cool! I used to write poetry when I was younger. I've always been a fan of video games too.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but my favorite genre is probably action-adventure games. I also like to play sports games and racing games.
I like to play action-adventure games too. I also like to play puzzle games and role-playing games.
I've never really been into puzzle games or role-playing games, but I've heard they're really fun.
They are! If you ever want to try them out, I'd be happy to let you borrow some of my games.
Thanks for the offer! I might just take you up on that.
